name: smart-campus-app-local
description: Root script to run all microservices locally

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../notice-service && npm install && cd ../complaint-service && npm install && cd ../booking-service && npm install && cd ../attendance-service && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd notice-service && node server.js" "cd complaint-service && node server.js" "cd booking-service && node server.js" "cd attendance-service && node server.js"
